attorneys.attorney_name: Dillon L. Ross Naval Submarine Base

charges.charge_description: 18:1382.P ENTERING MILITARY/NAVAL/COAST GUARD PROPERTY and 18:1361 Willfully Injuring U.S. Property (1)

charges.charge_disposition: The defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the United States Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a term of 6 months. Execution of term of imprisonment is suspended forthwith. The defendant is to perform 1000 hours of community services other than the vocational services currently being performed. (1)

charges.charge_description: 18:1382 Entering a Naval Installation and 18:1361 Willfully Injuring U.S. property
